references.paper_title: Deep policies for online bipartite matching: A reinforcement learning approach
references.reason: This paper proposes a reinforcement learning approach for online bipartite matching, which is relevant to the OBM problem studied in the main paper.

references.paper_title: An experimental study of algorithms for online bipartite matching
references.reason: This paper conducts an experimental study of various algorithms for online bipartite matching, offering insights into their practical performance and providing a benchmark for the main paper's algorithms.

references.paper_title: Online primal-dual algorithms for maximizing ad-auctions revenue
references.reason: This paper presents a primal-dual algorithm for online ad auctions which is a foundational work in online budgeted matching and inspires the design of algorithms in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Randomized primal-dual analysis of ranking for online bipartite matching
references.reason: This paper provides a randomized primal-dual analysis of online bipartite matching algorithms and informs the theoretical analysis of the algorithms in the main paper.
This paper provides a comprehensive overview of online matching and ad allocation, which is a fundamental problem related to online budgeted matching.
